descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][b]Description:[/b][/color]

There were many other mods out there that adds a smelter to Solitude, but in my hopinion all of them adds smelter in completly bad way: smelters under a roof, smelters that overrides quest markers or something similar.

I try to add the smelter in a better position, so it doesn't collide with any markers, walls, or roofs, but it's still close to blacksmith. Few clutter has been added to complete the immersion.


[color=yellow][b]My other mods:[/b][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3271584/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Check all of them here[/url]
author: nedellis
